Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Irving Park, Clarendon, Montrose and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Irving Park, Clarendon, Montrose and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
